::Zardus::

"Yes, much," Zardus replies, smiling as the console beeps, anouncing 
the finish of FZ's reprogramming. Zardus flips a switch, his other 
self sitting up.

FZ's mind was now tied half into the Iron Fist and half into Zardus 
through his wrist comp. The Iron Fist could controll him by itself, 
but so could Zardus when neccessary.

The exact copy stands up, Zardus making it walk over to a chair and 
sit down, waiting for Squizzy to exit the CR tank.

"We should get working on it as soon as possible," Zardus says, 
walking out of the room.

He opens his comm to all Alliance members, "Anyone who's not busy, 
please begin digging around the Alliance base and under it. We will 
lower it slowly into the ground, for defencive purpouses."

The Alliance leader exits the Iron Fist, work drones exiting behind 
him to begin digging.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Nemesis Enforcer:
> 
> 
> "Yes, underground." he replied into his comlink.  "Much safer than 
placing 
> the generators underwater."
